titleStmt.title: The vvhipper of the satyre his pennance in a white sheete: or, The beadles confutation
titleStmt.author: Guilpin, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. White] for Thomas Pauier,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: W.I. The whipping of the satyre.
Running title reads: The whippers pennance.
The last three leaves are blank.
Identified as STC 25351 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
